pkgmetadata.longdescription: Beautiful Colour Maps for Oceanography // Perceptually uniform palettes for commonly used variables in oceanography as functions taking an integer and producing character vectors of colours. See Thyng, K.M., Greene, C.A., Hetland, R.D., Zimmerle, H.M. and S.F. DiMarco (2016) doi:10.5670/oceanog.2016.66 for the guidelines adhered to when creating the palettes.
